# Copilot Custom Instructions

<!-- These instructions are automatically loaded by GitHub Copilot when working in this repo. -->

## General Preferences

- Be concise and direct
- Prefer simple solutions over clever ones
- Use modern language features and best practices
- Include brief inline comments only when logic is non-obvious

## Code Style

- Use consistent naming conventions per language
- Keep functions small and focused
- Prefer early returns over deeply nested conditionals
